application-yaml.label: Syntax error
application-yaml.description: Error parsing the input using snakeyaml

application-yaml.label: Unknown property
application-yaml.description: Property-key not found in the configuration metadata on the project's classpath

application-yaml.label: Value type mismatch
application-yaml.description: Expecting a value of a certain type, but value doesn't parse as such

application-yaml.label: Expect scalar
application-yaml.description: Expecting a 'scalar' value but found something more complex.

application-yaml.label: Expect type found sequence
application-yaml.description: Found a 'sequence' node where a non 'list-like' type is expected

application-yaml.label: Expect type found mapping
application-yaml.description: Found a 'mapping' node where a type that can't be treated as a 'property map' is expected

application-yaml.label: Expect mapping
application-yaml.description: Expecting a 'mapping' node but found something else

application-yaml.label: Expect bean property name
application-yaml.description: Expecting a 'bean property' name but found something more complex

application-yaml.label: Invalid bean property
application-yaml.description: Accessing a named property in a type that doesn't provide a property accessor with that name

application-yaml.label: Duplicate key
application-yaml.description: A mapping node contains multiple entries for the same key

application-yaml.label: Should escape
application-yaml.description: This key contains special characters and should probably be escaped by surrounding it with '[]'

application-properties.label: Invalid bean navigation
application-properties.description: Accessing a 'bean property' in a type that doesn't have properties (e.g. like String or Integer)

application-properties.label: Invalid indexed navigation
application-properties.description: Accessing a property using [] in a type that doesn't support that

application-properties.label: Expected dot or lbrack
application-properties.description: Unexpected character found where a '.' or '[' was expected

application-properties.label: Non integer in brackets
application-properties.description: Use of [..] navigation with non-integer value

application-properties.label: Value type mismatch
application-properties.description: Expecting a value of a certain type, but value doesn't parse as such

application-properties.label: Invalid bean property
application-properties.description: Accessing a named property in a type that doesn't provide a property accessor with that name

application-properties.label: Unknown property
application-properties.description: Property-key not found in any configuration metadata on the project's classpath

application-properties.label: Duplicate key
application-properties.description: Multiple assignments to the same property value
